description: Mobile data disabled while WiFi unavailable. Network type restriction or data saver mode.
commonCauses: Mobile data turned off in settings
App restricted in data usage settings
No data plan or quota exceeded
solutions: Check if mobile data is enabled
Request user to enable mobile data
prevention: Detect network type before large downloads
Use WorkManager constraints for network type
examples: val cm = getSystemService(ConnectivityManager::class.java); val capabilities = cm.getNetworkCapabilities(cm.activeNetwork); val isWiFi = capabilities?.hasTransport(TRANSPORT_WIFI) == true; val isCellular = capabilities?.hasTransport(TRANSPORT_CELLULAR) == true
